Find Out More

We believe there are no boundaries!

At Codes without Borders, we are fully commited to raising Nigeria's next generation of Programmers, if there was ever one. We believe in the unalienable right of access of the Nigerian child to, at least, basic useful computer science education, because we know as a matter of fact, that no matter their eventual chosen career, computers and technology will play a central role. We believe that arming the young ones with adequate computer science education will go a long way in developing their critical thinking ability which is a neccessary prerequisite for nation building. We intend to achieve our aims, through raising awareness that every child can learn how to code regardless of what they eventually study in the university and building a strong advocacy for modernization of the computer science curriculum in Nigerian schools. We would be glad if you contribute to the cause.

DONATE!

Our Events

Hour of Code

This December, we are going to a School in Lagos, to organize a Hour of Code, marking our first official event and launch. The Hour of Code is an annual worldwide event initiated by code.org to demystify and introduce computer science to children of all ages. This December event is proudly supported by the nigerian child initiative.

Teach a Child!

Spend an hour with a Child in public School this December, tutoring them in the Hour of Code, it doesn't matter whether you can find your way around a Computer or not, all that is required of you is either your Laptop, Tablet or Smart Phone. Together let's start building this Army. You will get a certificate acknowledging you volunteered, but most importantly, you will have fun, we promise.

Volunteer Now!

Let's Get In Touch!

Ready to support us, or maybe you just need a little more information? That's great! Give us a call or send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
